adjectives.description: polyethnic (comparative more polyethnic, superlative most polyethnic)

entries.meaning: (of a group or society) That contains people who together represent multiple ethnicities, especially such that they coexist and interact harmoniously.
examples: In the last 20 years, the sharp increase in immigration has brought "new faces in the crowd" and a much more polyethnic and multicultural country.

entries.meaning: (of a person) Who identifies as being of multiple ethnicities.
